import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const SingleProduct = ({prod}) => { const {pathname} = useLocation() const history = useNavigate() console.log("loc---> ", pathname) console.log("his---> ", history) console.log(window.location.href) return ( <>

{prod.name}

{prod.description}

Rs.{prod.finalPrice} {prod.strickPrice} {prod.discount}% OFF
) } export default SingleProduct
